This property verifies that signal A increments by 1 on the next clock cycle after a write operation when certain conditions are met. 

The verification triggers when, on a rising edge of clock signal Clk, the reset signal Rst is inactive (0), the write signal Wr is active (1), and signal A has a value less than 1. 

When these conditions occur, the property requires that on the immediately following clock cycle (##1), signal A must equal its previous value (captured using $past) plus 1. 

The assertion is disabled when reset signal Rst is active (1), meaning no verification occurs during reset conditions.
